lesson.subtitle: Aspect in Past: Result vs Process
lesson.description: Learner can distinguish result from process in past tense
objectives: Learner can distinguish result from process in past tense
Learner understands duration markers with imperfective
Learner can select aspect based on speaker's focus (result vs activity)
Learner recognizes completion markers with perfective
